title: AlgoSniper
short: A VS Code extension for algorithmic programming at the Charlemagne IT Department!
description: AlgoSniper is a VS Code extension that allows you to code in the algorithmic language used to learn coding at the Charlemagne IT Department.
It provides syntax highlighting, code completion, and a few other features to make it easier and quicker to write code. It also provides a way create the code's documentation and lexic.
This extension is open-source and available on GitHub. If you want to contribute, feel free to do so! You can also test the extension by downloading it from the Visual Studio Marketplace.
